<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><css>.containerPadding {
padding-top: 10px;

}
.panel-body{
background-color:#FFF;
}
.panel-heading, .panel-footer {
background-color: #e1edf1;
}
main{padding-top:0;}

.list-group-item > a {
  color: #6F7779;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: $text-font-size;
}
.carousel-inner .container {
  width:100%; 
  padding:0;
  max-height:410px;
}


.iconlink .fa-inverse{
	color: #ce0000;
}
.iconlink .text-default{
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.iconlink .text-default:hover{
	color: #53b0ba;
}
.iconlink h2 {
	color: #53b0ba;
}</css><draft>false</draft><dynamic_title_structure/><id>cir_home</id><internal>false</internal><public>false</public><roles>x_fru_cir.cir_base</roles><short_description/><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>paulo.gomes</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-25 09:44:28</sys_created_on><sys_id>882c8e491b730850df7e43f4bd4bcb43</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cir_home</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Corporate Incident Response" source="x_fru_cir">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Corporate Incident Response">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_882c8e491b730850df7e43f4bd4bcb43</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>paulo.gomes</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-25 09:44:28</sys_updated_on><title>CIR Homepage</title></sp_page><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=882c8e491b730850df7e43f4bd4bcb43"/></record_update>
